name: Australian Sparkling Ale
ingredients: 4kg of light malt, 500g of crystal malt, 500g of white sugar, 28g of pride of ringwood hop pellets [full boil], 14g of pride of ringwood hop pelllets [last 10 minutes of boil for Flavour], 1 wirlfloc tablet [or 1 tsp of irish moss powder], 15g of ale yeast
